title: password dimenticata
content: Buongiorno vorrei sincronizzare un nuovo PC ma non riesco più a ricordare la password, ho attivato la procedura di recupero... mi arriva un link sulla mail... mi ci collego .... mi chiede di inserire una delle 8 chiavi di recupero che ho stampato... la inserisco... ma mi dice che il link è già scaduto. come devo risolvere senza perdere i dati ?? grazie e saluti

title: Youtube videos does not play in latest firefox in my windows 7
content: Youtube urls are not playing at all in my browser. I could see the video,if i place cursor on the video slider, but it just buffers or just arrow rounding any youtube videos. Is there any miss on my part. I think that adobe flash player is not supported for windows that i possess. previously it was playing without any problem.

title: restore bookmarks/profile
content: My computer 'guru' reinstalled Win10 in order to correct a serious problem. ALL of my programs were gone and I was left with a raw Win10. 6/12/2023 was last date prior to the disaster. I reinstalled Firefox. Using the "firefox.exe -p" I can only find the default profile. I DO HAVE a full backup done using the Win7 Backup and Restore feature. How do I resurrect my most recent profile? I will need to find the files(s) manually from the b/u. When I did a Full Restore the bookmarks didn't appear. Where and what files am I looking for? The attached screen shots from the b/u may be of help. [removed email from public forum]
creator: newspr0

title: [Feature Request] Add sticky notes to Default Firefox Home Page
content: No third party extension from the Mozilla Add-On Store allows you to add your own sticky notes directly onto the Default Firefox Home Page. It seems to be because of security reasons. Could a sticky notes customization tool be built-in natively to Firefox itself to enable sticky notes to be created and pinned on the Default Firefox Home Page?
creator: PocketRocket

title: Windows 10 taskbar not appearing after Firefox 114.0.1 update
content:
I have my win10 taskbar on the left side of my screen, with auto-hide enabled. Never had any issue until the new update. When I start up Firefox (not in any full-screen mode) I pan my mouse to the left side of the screen and the taskbar no longer will show....Until i hit F11 to go full-screen and then hit F11 again to get out of it. Then the taskbar shows up as normal. Not sure why, nothing has been changed on my end since the last 4 or so updates and was fine until 114.0.1

Thanks.
creator: wickedmachine

title: Downloaded saved files get deleted after closing private browsing
content:
The only reason I'm making this question so that I can answer it and hope it helps someone else who is going through same problem.

If your pdf and image files are getting deleted after you close private browsing then simply go to settings and search download and a category called applications will appear which will show how different types of files gets handled.

Set the option to save file for all file types including image and pdf files. The problem should be solved
creator: hitaishi58

title: Connect to Etrade website
content: I am a longtime Firefox user. Recently, I have been unable to connect to the website E-Trade. I called E-Trade and they said the problem is at Firefox and they are working on it. Is that true? You are working on it. When will it be fixed?

title: Formatting doesn't carryover when I copy and paste from a website
content: An issue I am running into is with the paste option on Microsoft Word. I am clicking on keep source formatting in Word when I paste text, but the format doesn't carry over from the website I am copying it from. This is a Firefox issue because the format carries over when I paste a website's text using Microsoft Edge. Hopefully someone can solve this issue for me. Thank you.
creator: joenye
